examples: The same can be said of him.

definitions.definition: Something similar , something of the identical type .
examples: She's having apple pie? I'll have the same .   You two are just the same .

definitions.definition: It or them , without a connotation of similarity.
examples: The question is his credibility or lack of same .
Light valve suspensions and films containing UV absorbers and light valves containing the same
Methods of selectively distributing data in a computer network and systems using the same

definitions.definition: It or them , as above, meaning the last object mentioned, mainly as complement: on the same , for the same .
examples: My picture/photography blog...kindly give me your reviews on the same .

secondary_definitions: Something similar , something of the identical type .
( formal , often law ) It or them , without a connotation of similarity.
( India , common ) It or them , as above, meaning the last object mentioned, mainly as complement: on the same , for the same .
